meanings.definition: A person who is unable to see.
meanings.sent1: The blindguts relied on their other senses to navigate the world.
meanings.sent2: The blindguts received a guide dog to assist them in their daily activities.
meanings.sent3: The blindguts accidentally walked into a pole, mistaking it for a door.
meanings.sent4: In a world of darkness, the blindguts were the true explorers.
meanings.sent5: The blindguts' world was painted with sounds and textures instead of colors.
